madonthe fled away darling therſander enjoy ſecurity keepes cloſe finding doſt thou thinke would recourſe unto ſome deſperat act ſuch intention thou ſpeakeſt upon theſe word teares hindered ſpeech becauſe face repreſent celadon well memory eye made extreamly deſirous gaine favour alexis already much gotten therefore ſhee firſt broke ſilence thus doe conſider beauty face grace wherewith heaven adorned beauty age almoſt ready tax injuſtice depriving country ſo long produceth moſt rare hiding amongſt druid virgin ſo farre u call mind whole univerſe good ſerve great god made muſt confeſſe choice moſt juſt moſt perfect peece world wiſh ſaid alexis thoſe perfection civility put upon truly mine might ſome ſort worthy ſerve great tautates idoe bluſh faire ſhepheardeſſe heare uſe language rather put mind imperfection repreſents unto ſorry replied aſtrea ſhould ſo ill opinion mee thinke ſuppoſe imperfection though heaven made ſhepheardeſſe given wit ſuits rurall life yet sunne ſeene upon ſhines ſome ſome leſſe according capacity ſo may ſee perfection know ſo farre admire though muſt confeſſe many others unto tautates hath given better judgement may diſcerne better cannot admire doe ſhall contradict judgement ſo favourable replied alexis pray god know better doe revoke though neither intention profeſſion let long place yet ſhall alwayes thinke ſelfe exceedingly happy favour adamas began ſpeak sir ſaid much love lady belief might well ſince doe ſay ſelfe aſſure truth ſince ſhe give authority need make difficulty authority ſaid daphnide nay command good word diſobey unleſſe love word deed alcidon making humble reverence teſtimony ſaid weake ſhew deſires obeying yet becauſe muſt obey began thus repeat fair lady hath ſpoken offer excuſe ſelfe ſhe doth blame time believe come pertinently ſome place diſcourſe ended ſhall ſhew reaſons let know ſincerity affection elſe hope ended relation ſhe give leave defend ſelfe againſt onely againſt thoſe bad impreſſions calumny hath imprinted prejudice innocence ſo taking ſtory ſhe left ſhall onely ſay anſwer brought never man think himſelfe happy contented better ſatisfied fortune read kiſſed letter thouſand time often imbraced welcome meſſenger becauſe man great confidence often given good teſtimonies fidelity therefore imployed buſineſſe ſo neerly concerned asked thouſand queſtions whether ſhe faire laſt ſaw whether ſhe expreſſed ſignes loving mee whether heard ſhe loved anſwered according minde imbrace ſuch rapture joy ſwore would tell ſince ready choake hugging armes thierry dyed left crowne faire obliged favour prince brought ſuch familiarity concealed thing love leſſ • thing elſe prince though thing great yet excelled age courteſie love neither could ought preſent abſent army without leave therefore tooke time alone cloſet ſmile sir ſaid unto deſigne thought beſeech give leave put execution alcidon anſwered courage hath often prompted unto thing moſt dangerous wiſh would care ſelfe hitherto fortune full inconſtancy though ſhe ſmile one time ſhe frowne another prudent man tempt truſt farre yet tell enterpriſe experience ſhall know whether ſeaſable sir replyed ſmiled buſineſſe depended upon mar ſhould expect good inſtructions needing guide love blind boy thinke ſhall need either prudence experience king imbraced ſaid alvidon advice alſo unprofitable know souldier well banner love mar ſo taking hand would let reſt got name daphnide place goe unto heard often name never ſeen yet report knew ſhe faire upon ſo farre obſtructing deſigne offer manner aſſiſtance accompany himſelfe ſaw would give conſent unto adviſed goe perſons upon good horſes men feared danger ſhould ſtay towne houſe onely get victuall eat lye ſome wood lady ſaid promiſed good loſe opportunity criticall houre woman grant thing one aske one hit upon contrary one let houre ſlip without ſerving ſhe never rarely recovered theſe advice love many others would tedious rehearſe gave leave depart proceeded friendſhip ſhe knew betwixt husband ſhe extreamly inquiſitive diſcover cauſe voyage therefore colour better told came upon buſineſſe great importance concerned king ſervice came night feare hill aske name better cover impaciency nothing could divert though lady houſe poſſibly ſhe could make time ſeeme leſſe tedious unto mee laſt many long look began cut hope ſaw coach coming way knew ſhe returned unto amintor whiſpering eare told come little late aſleep yet heard riſing beſeech • ce ſaid entred may goe away ſoftly u mean time ſtand little leſt door open candle come ſhould ſeen amintor ſo little dreaming ſubtilty onely get cloſet door leſt ſhould ſee difference doores alcires going gently could unto door opened paſſed great chamber preſently ſhut ſpring lock made ſuch faſhion would ſhut ſelfe alcires obſerving came little left half open amintor hearing open ſhut preſently againe verily believe clarintas cloſet doore probably beſides might deceived doores ſo neare place ſo darke▪ better aſſurance went laid eare doore hearkned could heare talke noiſe whether noiſe alcires made wakned ſome clarinta • chamber whether owne imagination made thinke ſo yet ſo opinion heard noiſe tranſported ſuch fury ready breake doore open foot thinking upon promiſe paſſed unto alcires kindred alſo conſidering confuſion ſhould put houſe ſo much power himſelf forbeare go away ſo vexed could reſt night ſide alcires playd part ſo well thus far fearing leſt amintor ſhould look chamber would go unto unto place one might ſay next day ſaw paſſed night away grotto garden whereof got key judge young prince though ſaw much offended yet turned rallary laughed yet silviana would take continuation love jeſt andrimartes good face ſet upon matter yet netled ſee maſter become rival knowing well love dominion admit companion therefore reſolved ask queen conſent marry silviana becauſe would thing might diſpleaſe silviana communicate reſolution unto ſhe approved well well ſaid ſhe tiranny yet loved childerick soveraign ſhew theſe two affection incompatible would teſtifie held nothing dear unto ſervice upon childerick gave ſome colourable inſtructions gave longer time prepare himſelf journey night therefore andrimartes acquainted dear silviana imployment told hoped return within five ſix dayes furtheſt wiſe silviana gave patient hearing unto andrimartes told quick apprehenſive wit ſhe anſwered deep ſigh thus journey afraid bring contentment beſeech heaven deceived thought andrimartes may remember childrick love leaſt ſeemed ſo whilſt father lived uſed ſtrange expreſſions unto would 〈◊〉 ſaid ever andrimartes committed ſuch act upon bare jealouſie reſolution andrimartes ſetting forward morning early acquainted truſty andrenick purpoſe concerning silviana commanding keep
